attributes.review: Four years later when the app finally finished downloading I opened it up to find out it was an onlyfans for Donald j Trump! I was Greeted with him and prince Andrew with some underaged girls!! Don not recommend
attributes.title: I scarred for life

attributes.review: This app was great🧚‍♂️✨❤️ now delete it😁💫⭐️
attributes.title: What??

attributes.review: Racist, diabolical, homophobic, sexist, and extremely creepy. Oh, I wasn’t talking about the app; I was just talking about Trump. Anyways, R E N E G A D E🤑🤑🔥🔥✨
attributes.title: Absolutely Disgusting

attributes.review:
Daddy trump did us wrong with this one 😪 I was so excited to ✨🧚🏾‍♂️support the campaign🧚🏾‍♂️✨, and give Daddy Donald the presidency🏳️‍🌈, but when I downloaded the app it wouldn’t load 🙈 so I deleted it and tried again and it opened this time but it gave my phone 69 viruses 🦠 (that’s me and daddy donald’s favorite position hehe 😉) which wasn’t fun👎🏾. My phone started to crash and I bought it 2 days ago it’s the new iPhone 11 Pro Max and I spent so much money on it. Daddy Trump broke my phone and my heart 💔 
Heart ❤️ been broke 💔 so many 🔁 times ⏰ I don’t know what to believe 🤧 as the cool kids say
Since my phone is broken I’ve lost all of the cool merch I was gonna buy from daddy Donald’s website. It’s just sitting in the checkout waiting for me to put my credit card info in
attributes.title: I’m disappointed 😔

attributes.review: 💅🧚🏾‍♀️This is war, and Gen Z will win🤩😄💅. Beware. 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩🧚🏿‍♂️
attributes.title: Gross 🧚🏿‍♂️💅

attributes.review: I got this app to support our president, but it stole all my information and trump told my mom my deep dark secrets! When I confronted trump about it he came to my house, and when I opened the door her immediately drop kicked me, and while I was laying helplessly on the floor he spit on my face and then kid napped my dog!

So I was so excited for my Trump app, cause Trump 2020!!! Unfortunately it hacked my phone and deleted everything off of it. Just absolutely everything. Gone. What is on my phone is MY property and I demand all my stuff back! 0 stars, seriously the worst.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review:
I hate it
It is the worst app I  download.
attributes.title: I hate this app

attributes.review: So I’m a trump supporter and when I saw this app i had to download it. It took 60 hours to download and further more when i opened the app my phone electrocuted my hand then i dropped my phone and the screen shattered. It then grew legs and started running around the floor then my dog got so scared he ate it then died. Thanks 😍🤩🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨✨
attributes.title: Horrid
